hymn.title: O Father of glory, now grant unto me

layout.singingstanza: O Fath -- er of glo -- ry, now grant un -- to me A spir -- it of wis -- dom, a spir -- it to see; O give un -- to me the full know -- ledge of Him, En -- light -- 'ning the eyes of my heart deep with -- in.

lyrics.stanza: O Father of glory, now grant unto me A spirit of wisdom, a spirit to see; O give unto me the full knowledge of Him, Enlight'ning the eyes of my heart deep within.
O God of our Lord Jesus, let me perceive Th' exceeding great pow'r unto us who believe, The power that raised Christ, Thy Son, from the dead And made Him o'er all, to His Body, the Head.
O God, Thou hast wrought all this pow'r into Christ, Who now lives in me as my Person, my life. O grant revelation, dear Father, to see This transcending pow'r is a Person in me.
O Christ is the hope, He's the glory and power; So Christ I must take as my Person each hour. Then in me such power will be exercised, My hope and God's glory will be realized.
